programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs get trained to be sniffer dogs, protection dogs and search and rescue dogs in Austria. In the USA, dogs help to locate people trapped on the mountain and dogs who help guard the farms from wolves and coyotes.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren has arrived into Cape Town. This won’t be your average culinary exploration of a city; Warren has dedicated the entire episode to diving into a specific style of South African cooking known as ‘Cape Malay’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: Artist To Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Nicole Kidman’s acting coach Susan Batson, To Die For executive producer Jonathan Taplin, voice teacher Mary Setrakian, plus many more.

programme.title: Artist To Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Eraser director Chuck Russell, Conan The Destroyer co-star Sarah Douglas, Hercules In New York director Arthur Allan Seidelman, plus many more.

programme.title: Artist To Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Julia Roberts’ Pretty Woman costume designer Marilyn Vance, Michael Collins producer Stephen Woolley, The Hollywood Reporter’s Scott Feinberg, plus many more.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Being just that little bit different, can bring huge advantages, but it also presents almighty challenges. By going against the grain, these animals have found unique ways to stay alive.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Volunteers explore the community’s role in conservation, with thrilling honey harvesting, a new addition to the team, and a dream come true as one feeds a black rhino.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence examines existential threats to the worlds biosphere and what it means for the future of the planet, and Aotearoa.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Nezha

When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

Anton and Erika have been a couple for 12 years already. While he's not yet ready to get married, Erika waits until he is and lovingly devotes her time to him.

programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?

programme.title: Mana-Mana Tiba-Tiba
programme.desc: Wilson and Uging, by the virtue of being the first two people who visited the wake of the late Don Segundo became heirs to a two-hundred million fortune.
June (Bela Padilla) mourns the death of her boyfriend, Pao (JC Santos). In order to move forward, Marco (Zanjoe Marudo) stands as her proxy-boyfriend for 365 days.

programme.title: The Mall, The Merrier
programme.desc: Two siblings, Moira (Vice Ganda) and Morissette (Anne Curtis), feud over Tamol Mall, a mall they inherited. The feud is compounded with the arrival of their Aunt Moody.

programme.title: Trophy Wife
programme.desc: Lani (Cristine Reyes) draws Chino (Derek Ramsay), his brother, Sammy (John Estrada), and his girlfriend Gwen (Heart Evangelista) into a complex game of revenge. Will it be too late before one of the men reveals his dark side?

programme.title: Video City: Be Kind, Please Rewind
programme.desc: An uninspired filmmaker (Ruru Madrid) accidentally time travels back to the 90s at a Video City store, where he meets the woman (Yassi Pressman) who will change his life.

programme.title: Boy Golden
programme.desc: The leader of a notorious gang is released from prison. He is on the lookout for the rival gang leader who is responsible for his imprisonment and also the rape and murder of his sister. He plots and executes revenge with the help of his friends.

programme.title: Lupe, A Seaman's Wife
programme.desc: Lupe (Andrea del Rosario) and Manolo (Leandro Muñoz ) are a young couple whose marriage life is about to undergo a drastic change when Manolo leaves for another country.

programme.title: Kulimlim
programme.desc: The past has come to haunt Jake Cabrera. Based on technicality, the Supreme Court has ordered the release of the three men convicted of raping his wife after eight years in prison. Jake decides to render his own brand of justice and seeks the help of a retired colonel. This is Robin Padilla's finest dramatic performance yet.

programme.title: Sa Haba ng Gabi
programme.desc: When a zombie outbreak happens, two housemaids and a driver will need to survive their longest night ever as they get trapped inside the mansion.

programme.title: Pusong Mamon
programme.desc: A funny heart warming story about three extraordinary people and their equally extraordinary relationship.

programme.title: Perfect Strangers S2 E13 - Since I Lost My Baby
programme.desc: Finding success in life is hard. Finding success while sharing an apartment with your goat herder, immigrant, distant cousin may be nearly impossible--but it does generate a lot of humor in this offbeat comedy.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E05 - Behind The Wheel
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E13 - The Case of My Vanishing Master (Part I)
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E14 - The Case of My Vanishing Master (Part II)
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E01 - Samantha's Wedding Present
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S2 E13 - The Quest
programme.desc: Xena, one of the fiercest, sexiest, most self-empowered women as she travels defending the innocent from the forces of darkness. She is the very definition of girl power.

programme.title: CSI S4 E08 - After The Show
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: You thought your job was tough? Uncover the dangerous gigs of the past – from mercury-poisoned hat makers to kids crawling through chimneys – and imagine the risks behind everyday jobs of old.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Did you know beards can be deadly? Or that a lawnmower once killed a spectator at a football game? What if I told you someone died from drinking too much water? These are just some of the craziest deaths.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered about the most bizarre things that have fallen from the sky? From meteorites to seafood and even bathtubs, these are some truly unbelievable stories of what comes from above.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: When Motorola introduces the first handheld portable telephone to the world, the futuristic technology sets off a fierce battle among telecommunications companies to produce the most popular cell phone.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A man with aspirations to writing crime novels ends up the star of his own breakout story when he tries to escape from one of Mississippi's oldest and most notorious prison farms, Parchman Penitentiary.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S5)
programme.desc: A scientist and businessman team up to develop a vitamin C-rich war ration for the troops fighting in World War 2, which unexpectedly leads to the development of frozen concentrated orange juice.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Agaw-Armas
programme.desc: Benjie (Bong Revilla) is a hotel security officer who has just about everything going for him. His life seems almost perfect. Then, he is linked to a shooting incident tha may forever change his life.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Magdusa Ka (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Dina was the daughter of Dindo and his former maid, Nida. Aware of this fact, the girl constantly dreamt that one day she would be recognized by her father and would enjoy all the comforts of his moneyed lifestyle.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Kuwatog
programme.desc: Child sensation Niño Muhlach plays the lovable dwarf "Kuwatog." As punishment for his many pranks, he is transformed into a human child, here to remain until he does a deed that will benefit mankind.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan, Hanggang Kailan
programme.desc: On the death of their father, the heiress, Dina sent her illegitimate sisters Alice and Vina out of her vast hacienda and even deprived them of what was rightfully theirs. A few years later, the hardworking and determined Alice returned, ready to turn the tables on her wicked sister.

programme.title: Heartache City
programme.desc: Heartache City

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Nag-iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KAIZOKU: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: BOSAI:Safe Journey in Japan
programme.desc: The number of visitors to Japan is rising. However, many do not know what to do during an earthquake, tsunami or typhoon. Find out the technologies being developed to protect visitors from disasters.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to insects. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #5 I studied by listening to the radio. / Explain how you learned Japanese by putting "de" after the method you used. For example, "rajio de", meaning "by listening to the radio".

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: In November, the Deaflympics-an international sports competition for the hearing impaired-was held in Japan for the first time.NHK WORLD-JAPAN showed related programs,and promoted its services.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Tsukemono: Japan's Pickled Soul Food.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Getaway
programme.desc: Three KOLs set out to live‑stream their trip to a remote island, but are deceived by a mysterious old woman who traps them there, intent on finding brides for her disabled grandsons. As they are captured, they must race against time to escape.

programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A shooting suspect begins cutting himself with a pocket knife after investigators leave him alone in the interrogation room; a woman breaks down after telling police that she drowned her grandmother.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man breaks down sobbing after admitting to stabbing his mom; an actress tells detectives how and why she shot her estranged uncle; a suspected murderer tries to broker an immunity deal; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A serial killer faces tough questions in the interrogation room and after a woman is found dead in the middle of the road, the finger pointing begins when three suspects are interviewed.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A man falls asleep while driving and kills a construction worker on the road. Was he a reckless driver or an innocent man with an undiagnosed medical condition?

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: Charlotte Murray Pace, an LSU graduate, is found raped and stabbed to death in her home. The brutality of the crime scene reminds police of the unsolved case of Gina Wilson Green.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: On his last day as an undercover agent, Bergen County Detective Carlos James experiences his first shootout, and ATF Agent Jenn Eskew poses as a hitwoman to investigate a possible murder for hire.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: What begins as an open-and-shut case spins into a full-on investigation when a mother and son are found dead in their home. Was this a murder/suicide, or could someone else have been responsible?

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: An unlicensed midwife assists a home birth that ends in tragedy. The defence says she made the right calls, but the prosecution charges her with negligent child abuse resulting in death.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a teenager is found shot and dumped in the street, detectives struggle to figure out who he is and where he was killed.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Intérieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Nature En Symbiose
programme.desc: In the maquis, the Mediterranean climate rules unopposed. Sizzling summers, mild winters and violent thunderstorms that drench the landscape, in spring as in autumn. Such harsh seasonal variations leave the flora and fauna with no choice but to cooperate.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Champions D'Exception
programme.desc: Summary: Immersion within the France collective on the occasion of the 4th edition of the Women's Wheelchair Rugby Cup; interview with Anne-Élizabeth d'Acremont, wheelchair rugby player, who introduces us to her sport; discovery of the Soliroues association, which practices wheelchair roller.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares a snapper fish and chips.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Intérieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yétili
programme.desc: Nina and Léon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yétili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yétili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou
programme.desc: The High Priestess and Aunt Amlan join forces to overcome the soldiers. Pokou climbs a mango tree but each time she tries to pick its fruit it grows taller.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou
programme.desc: Pokou plays a game of mancala with the High Priestess. Lucio is still finding it difficult to finish the dishes the Komians give him. The last remaining Denkyra soldiers flee in all directions.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquête, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.desc: Maude, Pierre and Tom, friends of longstanding, meet up for a birthday party at Max and Lucie's. When they arrive they find Max kneeling beside Lucie's body. His guilt seems obvious. His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?
